thread.section_title: Science News and Analysis - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: Pay for Some New York Private School Chiefs Nears $1 Million

author: Leslie Brody
title: Pay for Some New York Private School Chiefs Nears $1 Million
text:
Compensation for the heads of some elite private K-12 schools in New York City is nearing $1 million.
Much in the cityâ€™s private school world can seem beyond the norm: the tuition and fees (topping $50,000 a year), the kindergarten application process (interviews for 4-year-olds), the facilities (climbing walls). And so too executive compensation that exceeds the pay of many college presidents.
Pay...
